local function purgeKey(t, k) local logLevel, c = GetCVar("taintLog"), -42 if (tonumber(logLevel) or 0) > 1 then if CVarCallbackRegistry then CVarCallbackRegistry:UnregisterEvent("CVAR_UPDATE") end SetCVar("taintLog", "1") else logLevel = nil end t[k] = nil repeat if t[c] == nil then t[c] = nil end c = c - 1 until issecurevariable(t, k) if logLevel then SetCVar("taintLog", logLevel) if CVarCallbackRegistry then CVarCallbackRegistry:RegisterEvent("CVAR_UPDATE") end end end
local patch do local q, skips = {}, securecall(function() local cb, r, _, an = select(4,GetBuildInfo()), {moon="haunted"} r.moon, _, an = nil, issecurevariable(r, "moon") for m, v, clo, chi in (GetAddOnMetadata(an, "X-TaintLess-DisableMitigations") or ""):gmatch("([%a_]+)=(%d+):?(%d*):?(%d*)") do if (clo == "" or cb >= clo+0) and (chi == "" or chi+0 >= cb) then r[m] = v + 0 end end return r end) function patch(name, version, impl) if name == nil then for qf, v in pairs(q) do securecall(qf, v) end elseif not ((tonumber(_G[name]) or 0) >= version or skips and skips[name] == version) then _G[name], q[impl] = version, version end end end

"Button" .. j] _ = issecurevariable(b, "checked") or purgeKey(b, "checked") _ = issecurevariable(b, "notCheckable") or purgeKey(b, "notCheckable") end end end) end)
